Hi, I’m **Jin Hu**, a Master’s student at **Monash University** focusing on **Health data Analysis**. 
I work with **R and Python** for health data analysis (survival analysis, GEE, mixed models).  
Recently, I’ve analysed MIMIC ICU data and NSW road-crash data, and presented applied survival models to non-technical audiences.
I value reproducible research with Quarto, tidy workflows, and clear communication of methods and limitations.
I’m currently looking for internships in the health analytics field.
